faq.question3: How is the contract between logisticians and carriers?
faq.answer1:
The cost of using the site is formed based on the following points:
1) Insurance Fund
2) Salary of employees
3) Website maintenance
faq.answer2: The Jukte.kz website and its owner are not responsible for the contract between the sender and the carrier and do not accompany in legal transactions, as well as for the unfair attitude of logisticians and carriers.
faq.answer3: After you have confirmed your agreement on the website, you confirm that you have entered into an agreement directly with the shipper/carrier regarding the forthcoming transportation. Further legal action is taken outside the site.
faq.answer4: The calculator works on the basis of pricing for fuels and lubricants (fuels and lubricants), and also takes into account the depreciation of transport and toll roads, also includes the work of the freight carrier and takes into account the rate of the logistician for the provision of transportation services, the price can also change both up and down based on taking into account the price of fuel and lubricants and toll roads.
